bug.author: cheyang
bug.summary: Failed to load the data from alluxio due to NullPointerException
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.1.0-snapshot Describe the bug Failed to load the data from alluxio: <denchmark-code># time /opt/alluxio/bin/alluxio fs distributedLoad --replication 1 --thread 54 /training-data/images/ /training-data/images/validation-00103-of-00128 is loaded /training-data/images/train-00633-of-01024 loading /training-data/images/train-00210-of-01024 is loaded /training-data/images/train-00276-of-01024 loading /training-data/images/train-00366-of-01024 is loaded /training-data/images/train-00489-of-01024 loading java.lang.RuntimeException: Failed to successfully complete the job.
real 0m11.479s user 0m9.525s sys 0m0.567s </denchmark-code>
And from alluxio job master I can see <denchmark-code>2019-10-09 02:56:59,966 INFO JobCoordinator - Starting job LoadConfig{FilePath=/training-data/images/train-00489-of-01024, Replication=1} 2019-10-09 02:57:00,304 WARN SaslStreamServerDriver - Error received for channel: e2dea859-e86e-45e2-ba02-2e56a2df3e37. Error: io.grpc.StatusRuntimeException: CANCELLED: cancelled before receiving half close </denchmark-code>
And from alluxio job worker I can see <denchmark-code>2019-10-09 02:56:59,559 INFO TaskExecutorManager - Task 0 for job 1570547870248 failed: java.lang.NullPointerException (GrpcDataReader{request=block_id: 9915334656 offset: 0 length: 141324907 promote: false chunk_size: 1048576 open_ufs_block_options { ufs_path: "oss://imagenet-huabei5/images/train-00590-of-01024" offset_in_file: 0 block_size: 141324907 maxUfsReadConcurrency: 2147483647 mountId: 8276241989400795136 no_cache: true } , address=WorkerNetAddress{host=192.168.0.195, rpcPort=29999, dataPort=29999, webPort=30000, domainSocketPath=, tieredIdentity=TieredIdentity(node=192.168.0.195, rack=null)}}) </denchmark-code>
To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior (as minimally and precisely as possible) Expected behavior A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. Urgency Describe the impact and urgency of the bug. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/calvinjia>@calvinjia</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/bradyoo>@bradyoo</denchmark-link> , here is a reported job worker issue with . Can you take a look?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/cheyang>@cheyang</denchmark-link> It looks like the NPE is being thrown by (see ), is this a class you have added to your distro of Alluxio?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/cheyang>@cheyang</denchmark-link> - please re-open if that class is not added by you.
